summary: A number of cybercriminal innovations are making it easier for scammers to cash in on your upcoming travel plans.  This story examines a recent spear-phishing campaign that ensued when a California hotel had its booking. com credentials stolen...
title: Booking.com Phishers May Leave You With Reservations

summary: With the recent release of Factorio’s Space Age expansion, we’ve been playing a lot of the base-building game — and that started with setting up a multiplayer server and sharing it into our friends’ tailnets
title: Share a multiplayer Factorio server over Tailscale

feedTitle: Ed Zitron's Where's Your Ed At
summary: Soundtrack: EL-P - FlyentologyAt the core of Microsoft, a three-trillion-dollar hardware and software company, lies a kind of social poison — an ill-defined, cult-like pseudo-scientific concept called 'The Growth Mindset" that drives company decision-making in everything from how products are sold, to how your on-the-job performance is
title: The Cult of Microsoft
